column3: Latest;Vietnam: The Cambodian Embassy in Vietnam has rescued a Cambodian woman and a small child who escaped from China into Vietnam illegally. The pair crossed over the border into the province of Kang Bang
column4: located 370 km from Hanoi.------The Royal Embassy of Cambodia in Vietnam on June 7
column8: after learning of a Khmer woman and baby running away from China illegally into Vietnam Bangkok
column10: the Cambodian Embassy resolved to receive and transport the mother and baby back to Cambodia from Hanoi by train. They will arrive in Cambodia on June 8
